data.event: Riverside proclaimed itself the future birthplace of Captain James T. Kirk, a fictional character from the television series Star Trek, with the agreement of Gene Roddenberry.
The settlement of Riverside was established in 1872 and incorporated in 1882.
The settlement of Riverside was established in 1872 and incorporated in 1882.

event.title: built a 66 miles (106 km) branch from Iowa City to What Cheer via Riverside in 1879

data.event: The Burlington, Cedar Rapids and Northern Railway built a 66 miles (106 km) branch from Iowa City to What Cheer via Riverside in 1879.
